title: Ping pong Time!
content: You have two options, play ping-pong if there is an available table and to be fair he should play with his non skilled hand. Otherwise, bounce the a ball as many time as you can (but you should be sit), and yes, you can distract the other guy but not touching her/him. The winner can ask for whatever he/she wants

title: Are you enough fast with your hands?
content: Play 'the nervious', this should be play with an english deck of cards, you split the deck in two and each player should throw a card and count at the same time, if the card is the same as the number the first that put the hand in the deck win the turn, there is a winner when someone don't have cards in his/her hands
